translations: v．屈尊，俯就：表示出对某事物或某人的不屑一顾，但仍然勉强去做。

sentences.sentence: She just grunted, not deigning to look up from the page.
sentences.translation: 她只咕哝了一声，继续看书，不屑抬起头来看一眼。

sentences.sentence: She passed by without deigning to look at me.
sentences.translation: 他从我身旁走过，竟没有屈尊看我一眼。

sentences.sentence: He walked past me without even deigning to look at me.
sentences.translation: 他从我身旁走过，竟没有屈尊看我一眼。
